mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (post_idx, member_idx, cmt_content) VALUES (#{post_idx}, #{member_idx}, #{cmt_content})
mapper.update: update comment set cmt_content=#{cmt_content} where cmt_idx=#{cmt_idx}
mapper.select: select count(*) from comment where post_idx=#{post_idx}

mapper.update: update reply set re_content=#{re_content} where re_idx=#{re_idx}
mapper.select: select * from comment where post_idx = #{post_idx} limit 3;
